body:
Updated tools/install-powershell.ps1 so it selects and installs the ARM64 MSIX file when run with the -UseMSI flag on an ARM64 Windows machine.

Fixes #12979

comments.author: msftbot[bot]

title: Add support for installing ARM64 MSIX package.
